chart_description: This chart tracks the number of disk write operations per second executed by systemd services on the system. It is useful to monitor the disk write workload that systemd services are generating.

dimension_descriptions.system-slice_netdata-service: The dimension represents the name of the slice that systemd services belong to. Systemd slices are used to group systemd units and can be used to limit resource usage for a group of services. This dimension can help identify which services are generating higher disk write workloads.
